      • conjugate

        public Term conjugate​(EnumVerbModes mode,
                      EnumVerbPersons person,
                      EnumVerbTenses tense,
                      EnumVerbVoices voice,
                      EnumVerbDefiniteness definiteness)
        Conjugates the verb within the specified parameters
        Parameters:
        mode - The mode of the resulting form
        person - The person of the resulting form
        tense - The tense of the resulting form
        voice - The voice of the resulting form
        definiteness - The definiteness stance of the resulting form
        Returns:
        The term representing the conjugated form of the verb

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Verb verb)
        Tests for equality with another verb
        Parameters:
        verb - The another verb
        Returns:
        true if both verbs have the same internal representation, false otherwise
